meta.title: LocationCollectionResponse - Models - API Reference
meta.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

blocks.data: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

items.description: Contains information about a physical location associated with the store, for storefront display, shipping and inventory considerations.

address_type.description: For use by future freight shipping integrations

operating_hours.description: Set of operating hours for regular business and parcel collection

regular.description: Operating hours during a standard week

from.description: Start of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

from.description: Start of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

from.description: Start of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

special.description: Operating hours for specific dates of the calendar year

name.description: Name for the special hours of operation e.g. Xmas 2018

from.description: Start of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

special.description: Operating hours for specific dates of the calendar year

name.description: Name for the special hours of operation e.g. Xmas 2018

from.description: Start of time period in hh:mm format

to.description: End of time period in hh:mm format

is_shipping_origin.description: Can products be shipped from this location?  Default true.

is_default_shipping_origin.description: Is this the default shipping origin?  Default false.

fulfilled_by.description: Who fulfills orders at this location?  Default `merchant`.

is_inventory_read_only.description: Is this inventory managed outside of BigCommerce?  Default false.

is_visible_on_storefront.description: Is this location visible in any store locator components?  Default true.

is_inventory_available_online.description: Is inventory available for online sale?  Default true.

liftgate_assistance_required.description: Liftgate requirement for freight pickup from location.  Default false.

accept_returns.description: Potentially for prepaid return shipping labels, also to display return locations for shoppers under account page.

allow_in_store_pickup.description: Includes additional shipping option at checkout for shoppers

date_modified.description: When this location was last modified.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
